db:abstract.db:para: The QRadioDataControl class provides access to the RDS functionality of the radio in the QMediaService.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The functionality provided by this control is exposed to application code through the QRadioData class.
The interface name of QRadioDataControl is org.qt-project.qt.radiodatacontrol/5.0 as defined in QRadioDataControl_iid.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QRadioDataControl::QRadioDataControl(QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a radio data control with the given parent.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QRadioDataControl::~QRadioDataControl()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a radio data control.

db:section.db:title: void QRadioDataControl::alternativeFrequenciesEnabledChanged(bool enabled)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the alternative frequencies setting has changed to the value of enabled.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QRadioData::Error QRadioDataControl::error() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the error state of a radio data.

db:section.db:title: void QRadioDataControl::error(QRadioData::Error error)
db:section.db:para: Signals that an error has occurred.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QRadioDataControl::errorString() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a string describing a radio data's error state.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QRadioDataControl::isAlternativeFrequenciesEnabled() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if Alternative Frequency is currently enabled

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QRadioData::ProgramType QRadioDataControl::programType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current Program Type

db:section.db:title: void QRadioDataControl::programTypeChanged(QRadioData::ProgramType programType)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the Program Type programType has changed

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QRadioDataControl::programTypeName() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current Program Type Name

db:section.db:title: void QRadioDataControl::programTypeNameChanged(QString programTypeName)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the Program Type Name programTypeName has changed

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QRadioDataControl::radioText() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current Radio Text

db:section.db:title: void QRadioDataControl::radioTextChanged(QString radioText)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the Radio Text radioText has changed

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QRadioDataControl::setAlternativeFrequenciesEnabled(bool enabled)
db:section.db:para: Sets the Alternative Frequency to enabled

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QRadioDataControl::stationId() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current Program Identification

db:section.db:title: void QRadioDataControl::stationIdChanged(QString stationId)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the Program Identification stationId has changed

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QRadioDataControl::stationName() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current Program Service

db:section.db:title: void QRadioDataControl::stationNameChanged(QString stationName)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the Program Service stationName has changed

db:section.db:title: QRadioDataControl_iid
db:section.db:para: Defines the interface name of the QRadioDataControl class.
